Text: Why won't anybody upload this for ps2? (TT^TT)

Can anybody confirm if this works? I've wasted 4 CDs on this game and got the "disc is unreadable screen". First 3 discs were memorex (worked for me in the past) then tried verbatim, and still no luck. abgx also doesn't pick up at corruption and passes the stealth test. So wtf is wrong?!
did you get an extraction error when unraring?
